name: Tomatoes With Gorgonzola
recipeYield: 4 to 6 servings as an appetizer or side dish
keywords: basil, gorgonzola, tomato, raw, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: Extra-virgin olive oil to taste (about 1/3 cup)
Chopped fresh basil leaves to taste (about 1/4 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the tomato slices on 4 to 6 plates, drizzle some olive oil over them and sprinkle them with basil and black pepper.
Crumble the Gorgonzola and distribute it over the tops of all the slices. Do the same with the pine nuts. Sprinkle on the remaining olive oil and serve.
